name: Bike Race Shooter
description:
Bike Rider Adventure killer is zombies Kill out mission with amazing new concept , you have to drive your bike
in this track , find out dead people called zombies walking in this map and kill them using missile system attached to your sports bike.


So this is the best zombies killer bike rider game.


Features

Sports Bike with shot range Missiles to kill zombies.
Cool Animations and fire system.
Best Bike Race experience.
All features are free.
Bike race and shooting all in one game.


Play and invite others to play this amazing bike rider and zombies killer new concept game.
